動物用藥品名稱: 益獸新城病、產蛋下降症、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病不活化混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防種雞與蛋雞新城病、雞產蛋下降症、雞傳染性支氣管炎、雞傳染性華氏囊病感染。
ingredients: INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE>=50PD50; INACTIVATED EDS `76 >=10^8EID50(BEFORE INACTIVATION); INACTIVATED INFECTIOUS  BRONCHITISVIRUS STRAIN MASSACHUSETTS M41>=10^7.5EID50(BEFORE INACTIVATION);INACTIVATED GUMBORO DISEASE VIRUS>=10^6EID50(BEFORE INACTIVATION);SORBITAN MONOOLEATE 0.037ML; LIGHT MINERAL OIL 0.337ML; THIOMERSAL50UG.
